description: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 2, 3, 5} mod 7.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,1,-1).
formula: Contribution from Bruno Berselli, Dec 01 2010: (Start)G.f.: x*(1+x+x^2+2*x^3+2*x^4) / ((1-x)^2*(1+x+x^2+x^3)).a(n) = (14*n+(3*I-1)*(-I)^n-(3*I+1)*I^n-(-1)^n-13)/8 where I is the imaginary unit. (End)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
